content:
The Ministers of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umerov and the Republic of Estonian Khanno, which is on a visit to Ukraine, discussed further cooperation and assistance to Ukraine.

About thisreportedHead of the Defense Office of Ukraine on Facebook.

"Thankful Estonia and Defense Minister Hanno Pevkura for a new package of military assistance worth € 20 million, in particular, it includes priority artillery ammunition for Ukraine," Rustem Umerov wrote.

The parties also discussed the situation at the front and agreed to deepen security and defense cooperation.

“We join our efforts to stop the enemy and restore the sustainable peace in Ukraine. We will win together! ” - the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umerov summarized.

As reportedArmyinform, The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine thanked Estonia for a new package of assistance, which contains artsnamer.

As you know, a new military assistance packagewill includeArtillery ammunition, anti -tank weapons, explosives, sniper equipment and other weapons. Estonia also transmits 155 mm caliber shells, which is an additional contribution to its country to the European Union initiative.
title: The Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Estonia have agreed to deepen security and defense cooperation
description: This was reported by the head of the Defense Office of Ukraine on Facebook. “I am grateful to Estonia and ...
author: Army Inform
